summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite that validates the legacy data persistence functions of the Arkouda library, ensuring that saving and loading of diverse dataset types (e.g., strings, categorical data, multi‑dimensional arrays) works correctly across HDF5 and Parquet formats despite the APIs being deprecated.
business_intent: Guarantee backward compatibility and reliability of older I/O interfaces for existing Arkouda users, preventing regressions in data serialization and deserialization workflows.
